author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Chris Lombardi "POS: Msr has double event issue in linux" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-1671) - OFBIZ-1671
Also changed UseWindow=false and removed the associated comment in xpos.properties
In previsous commit in trunk, I wrote by mistake "temporary patch", it was not, it was a complete one as this one is
